title: Keweenaw National Historical Park: Webcams
body: Webcams        Portage Lift Bridge in summer. pasty.com webcam screenshot       The National Park Service at Keweenaw National Historical Park does not currently have a webcam operating in the park. There are several webcams in the area that are operated by park partners or others. You can visit their links below.      Portage Lake Lift Bridge Webcam between Houghton and Hancock, Michigan (provided by Pasty.net) Eagle Harbor, Michigan Webcam (provided by Cable America) Copper Harbor, Michigan Webcam (provided by A View from the Field)
